snippet: The court declined to hear an appeal from Arizona officials seeking to reinstate a state law barring most abortions after 20 weeks of gestation.
abstract: Supreme Court declines to hear appeal from Arizona officials seeking to revive a state law barring most abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy.

byline.original: By ADAM LIPTAK and FERNANDA SANTOS
byline.contributor: Adam Liptak reported from Washington, and Fernanda Santos from Phoenix. Erik Eckholm contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The court declined to hear an appeal from Arizona officials seeking to reinstate a state law barring most abortions after 20 weeks of gestation.

headline.main: Supreme Court Won’t Hear Arizona Appeal on Abortion Ban
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Won’t Hear Arizona Appeal on Abortion Ban
